rdf:Description.dc:title: A passion for the land : public lands in Alberta 1930-2005 2008 public lands in Alberta 1930-2005 /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Ball, Ron.
Forbes, Mac.
Alberta. Alberta Sustainable Resource Development.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "This book is dedicated to the countless men and women who over our organization's 75-year history have contributed their energy, insight and determination to the wise management and efficient administration of Alberta's public lands" -- page after cover.
University of Alberta copy in the Prairie Provinces Collection.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Alberta. Public Lands Division.
Public lands
Land use
Petroleum industry and trade
